bill_title: allow transfer of administrative operations of the cement plant retirement plan to the South Dakota Retirement System.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to allow transfer of administrative operations of the cement plant retirement plan to the South Dakota Retirement System. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 5-17 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of § § 5-17-5 and 5-17-10 notwithstanding, the Cement Plant Commission may agree to transfer all administrative operations of the cement plant retirement plan to the South Dakota retirement system. If such transfer is made: (1) A member or other beneficiary of the cement plant retirement plan remains entitled to the retirement benefits that the member accrued under the cement plant plan; (2) The state is responsible to provide and maintain, as necessary, full actuarial funding of the cement plant retirement plan; and (3) The provisions of § § 5-17-5.2 and 5-17-5.3 remain in effect. Section 2. That chapter 3-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The system is authorized to accept a transfer of administrative operations of the cement plant retirement plan pursuant to the provisions of section 1 of this Act. Section 3. The repeal of a portion or all of chapter 5-17 shall have no effect on the provisions of this Act.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
